text: is prakaar dhokha dekar usane un donon ko jhuka liya. antatah jab unhonne us vrksh ka svaad liya, to unakee sharmagaahe ek-doosare ke saamane khul gae aur ve apane oopar baag ke patte jod-jodakar rakhane lage. tab unake rab ne unhen pukaara, "kya mainne tum donon ko is vrksh se roka nahin tha aur tumase kaha nahin tha ki shaitaan tumhaara khula shatru hai
